name: Query
tagline: Software that enhances our customers' business
description:
We are specialists in the development of custom software based on Microsoft technology making use for the construction of our products of standards and methodologies of project management.
We offer integral services in technology to ensure the success of the projects, providing training , consulting , custom development and outsourcing of resources experts in technology.
